Command.name: Command
Command.description: A bash command executed in Claude Code with metadata (description, cwd, stdout, stderr, timestamp, session_id). The core entity that users search and browse.

Session.name: Session
Session.description: A Claude Code conversation session containing multiple tool uses and commands. Sessions are stored as JSONL files in ~/.claude/projects/.

Index.name: Index
Index.description: The SQLite database storing indexed commands with FTS5 full-text search. Located at ~/.cc-dejavu/history.db.

SearchCommands.name: SearchCommands
SearchCommands.description: Search command history using substring or regex patterns. Returns ranked results with match highlighting.

ListCommands.name: ListCommands
ListCommands.description: List recent commands ordered by frecency or timestamp. Supports directory filtering.

SyncHistory.name: SyncHistory
SyncHistory.description: Scan Claude Code session files and extract bash commands into the index. Supports incremental and force modes.

OnboardUser.name: OnboardUser
OnboardUser.description: Add deja documentation to ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md so Claude knows how to use command history search.

ParseSessionFiles.name: ParseSessionFiles
ParseSessionFiles.description: Parse JSONL session files, extract tool_use and tool_result pairs, and structure them as ParsedCommand objects.

FormatOutput.name: FormatOutput
FormatOutput.description: Format command results for terminal display with status indicators, timestamps, descriptions, and match highlighting.

FullTextSearch.name: FullTextSearch
FullTextSearch.description: FTS5 virtual table with BM25 ranking for semantic command matching. Indexes command text and description.

FrecencyRanking.name: FrecencyRanking
FrecencyRanking.description: Combines frequency (log10 scaling) with recency (time-decay weights: 4h=100, 24h=70, 7d=50, 30d=30, older=10) for intelligent result ranking.

IncrementalSync.name: IncrementalSync
IncrementalSync.description: Tracks file byte offsets in indexed_files table to resume syncing from where we left off, avoiding re-processing.

dec-1769000902441.what: Use SQLite with FTS5 for local search
dec-1769000902441.why: Provides fast full-text search with BM25 ranking without external dependencies. Single file database is portable and privacy-preserving.

dec-1769000902596.what: Use Bun runtime instead of Node.js
dec-1769000902596.why: Native TypeScript execution, built-in SQLite bindings, fast compilation to standalone binaries for distribution.

dec-1769000902742.why: Combines frequency and recency to surface both commonly-used and recently-used commands. Borrowed from browser URL bars.

dec-1769000902891.what: Track byte offsets for incremental sync
dec-1769000902891.why: Session files can be large. By tracking last byte offset, we only parse new content on subsequent syncs.

dec-1769000903042.why: Privacy-first design. Never modifies Claude session files. No cloud sync. All data stays on user machine.

dec-1769000903192.why: Ensures results are always up-to-date without requiring manual sync. Can be disabled with --no-sync flag.
